title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 95.9 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 95.9 - Public notice

State Regulations
A notice containing the job title and business address of
the records access officers and fiscal officer; the job title, business address
and telephone number of the appeal person or persons or body, and the location
where records can be seen or copied, shall be posted in a conspicuous location
wherever records are kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
95.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
